org.strongback.components.ui

Interface InputDevice

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FlightStick, Gamepad

    public interface InputDevice
    A simple collection of axes and buttons.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static InputDevice create(IntToDoubleFunction axisToValue, IntToBooleanFunction buttonNumberToSwitch, IntToIntFunction padToValue)
      Create an input device from the supplied mapping functions.
      ContinuousRange getAxis(int axis)
      Get the analog axis for the given number.
      Switch getButton(int button)
      Get the button for the given number.
      DirectionalAxis getDPad(int pad)
      Get the directional axis for the given D-pad number.

    • Method Detail

      • getAxis

        ContinuousRange getAxis(int axis)
        Get the analog axis for the given number.
        Parameters:
        axis - the axis number
        Returns:
        the analog axis, or null if there is no such axis

      • getButton

        Switch getButton(int button)
        Get the button for the given number.
        Parameters:
        button - the button number
        Returns:
        the button, or null if there is no such button

      • getDPad

        DirectionalAxis getDPad(int pad)
        Get the directional axis for the given D-pad number.
        Parameters:
        pad - the pad number
        Returns:
        the directional axis, or null if there is no such axis for the given D-pad number

      • create

        static InputDevice create(IntToDoubleFunction axisToValue,
                          IntToBooleanFunction buttonNumberToSwitch,
                          IntToIntFunction padToValue)
        Create an input device from the supplied mapping functions.
        Parameters:
        axisToValue - the function that maps an integer to a double value for the axis
        buttonNumberToSwitch - the function that maps an integer to whether the button is pressed
        padToValue - the function that maps an integer to the directional axis output
        Returns:
        the resulting input device; never null
